mapper.sql: id, patientCode, SDB, SH, SFH, SAH, SAZ, STFD, STSX, CHS, HT, NT, FT, ST, CM, SM, HM, JDM, CHIM, XIM, XM, JM, LM, HUAM, RM, HBT, WT, HNT, TH, TSH, TSHE, SYBY, LMDZ, LMQZ, LMZH, LMZHO, LMNZ, LMXX
mapper.update:
UPDATE df_specimen_specialized_examination
patientCode = #{map.patientCode},
SDB = #{map.sDB},
SH = #{map.sH},
SFH = #{map.sFH},
SAH = #{map.sAH},
SAZ = #{map.sAZ},
STFD = #{map.sTFD},
STSX = #{map.sTSX},
CHS = #{map.cHS},
HT = #{map.hT},
NT = #{map.nT},
FT = #{map.fT},
ST = #{map.sT},
CM = #{map.cM},
SM = #{map.sM},
HM = #{map.hM},
JDM = #{map.jDM},
CHIM = #{map.cHIM},
XIM = #{map.xIM},
XM = #{map.xM},
JM = #{map.jM},
LM = #{map.lM},
HUAM = #{map.hUAM},
RM = #{map.rM},
HBT = #{map.hBT},
WT = #{map.wT},
HNT = #{map.hNT},
TH = #{map.tH},
TSH = #{map.tSH},
TSHE = #{map.tSHE},
SYBY = #{map.sYBY},
LMDZ = #{map.lMDZ},

LMZH = #{map.lMZH},
LMZHO = #{map.lMZHO},
LMNZ = #{map.lMNZ},

WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM df_specimen_specialized_examination
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND patientCode like CONCAT('%', #{patientCode} , '%')
AND SDB like CONCAT('%', #{sDB} , '%')
AND SH like CONCAT('%', #{sH} , '%')
AND SFH like CONCAT('%', #{sFH} , '%')
AND SAH like CONCAT('%', #{sAH} , '%')
AND SAZ like CONCAT('%', #{sAZ} , '%')
AND STFD like CONCAT('%', #{sTFD} , '%')
AND STSX like CONCAT('%', #{sTSX} , '%')
AND CHS like CONCAT('%', #{cHS} , '%')
AND HT like CONCAT('%', #{hT} , '%')
AND NT like CONCAT('%', #{nT} , '%')
AND FT like CONCAT('%', #{fT} , '%')
AND ST like CONCAT('%', #{sT} , '%')
AND CM like CONCAT('%', #{cM} , '%')
AND SM like CONCAT('%', #{sM} , '%')
AND HM like CONCAT('%', #{hM} , '%')
AND JDM like CONCAT('%', #{jDM} , '%')
AND CHIM like CONCAT('%', #{cHIM} , '%')
AND XIM like CONCAT('%', #{xIM} , '%')
AND XM like CONCAT('%', #{xM} , '%')
AND JM like CONCAT('%', #{jM} , '%')
AND LM like CONCAT('%', #{lM} , '%')
AND HUAM like CONCAT('%', #{hUAM} , '%')
AND RM like CONCAT('%', #{rM} , '%')
AND HBT like CONCAT('%', #{hBT} , '%')
AND WT like CONCAT('%', #{wT} , '%')
AND HNT like CONCAT('%', #{hNT} , '%')
AND TH like CONCAT('%', #{tH} , '%')
AND TSH like CONCAT('%', #{tSH} , '%')
AND TSHE like CONCAT('%', #{tSHE} , '%')
AND SYBY like CONCAT('%', #{sYBY} , '%')
AND LMDZ like CONCAT('%', #{lMDZ} , '%')
AND LMQZ like CONCAT('%', #{lMQZ} , '%')
AND LMZH like CONCAT('%', #{lMZH} , '%')
AND LMZHO like CONCAT('%', #{lMZHO} , '%')
AND LMNZ like CONCAT('%', #{lMNZ} , '%')
AND LMXX like CONCAT('%', #{lMXX} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
